value.title: StarCraft 2: EPIC Semi Finals - Maru vs herO! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: The best Terran facing off against the best Protoss. This series of StarCraft 2 is the semi finals of Dreamhack Atlanta. Maru is considered to be the best Terran player of all time in SC2, and herO has once again grabbed the title of best Protoss after completing his military service some time ago. This
